fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Teach someone about the aerodynamics of a cow, they will be so perplexed that they will be roleblocked, at the start of the next night, they will understand it and get your goal.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Targeting someone will also hide all night feedback, the only feedback they get will be the attached photo.
- Roleblock immune roles are smart enough to understand it right away, getting your goal at the start of the day.
- Once your goal is reached, they game will end.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the majority of alive players understand the aerodynamics of a cow.
